Package squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx

Class SquidPanelBuilder

java.lang.Object
squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx.IPanelBuilder.Skeleton
squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx.SquidPanelBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPanelBuilder
public abstract class SquidPanelBuilder
extends IPanelBuilder.Skeleton
An almost-concrete implementation of IPanelBuilder. This class makes the assumption that font files are only available for square and even sizes. The only method to implement is fontfile(int) that must return the name of the file where a font of a given size lives.

I think this class should be generalized so that it supports cell width and cell height that are proportional (for example: a height that is the double of the width), but not to arbitrary combinations. In that case adjustCellSize(int) would become impossible to implement.

Author:
smelC

      public SquidPanelBuilder​(int smallestFont, int largestFont, int fontOffset, squidpony.IColorCenter<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color> icc, com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager assetManager)
      Parameters:
      smallestFont - The smallest font size available.
      largestFont - The largest font size available.
      fontOffset - This offset is added to the cell size when computing the font size for a given cell size.
      icc - The color center to give to SquidPanel.setColorCenter(IColorCenter), or null not to call this method.
      assetManager -

  • Method Details

    • buildScreenWide

      public SquidPanel buildScreenWide​(int screenWidth, int screenHeight, int desiredCellSize, TextCellFactory tcf)
      Description copied from interface: IPanelBuilder
      This method builds a panel whose number of cells is such that the cell size is close to desiredCellSize. This method only supports square cells.
      Parameters:
      screenWidth - The screen's width, in number of pixels, as given by libgdx.
      screenHeight - The screen's height, in number of pixels, as given by libgdx.
      desiredCellSize - The cell size that you would like the panel to have. Width and height cannot be different, because this method supports only square cells.
      tcf - The TextCellFactory to use. Can be null to create the panel.
      Returns:
      A screen wide squid panel, margins-aware, and with its position set.

    • buildByCells

      public SquidPanel buildByCells​(int hCells, int vCells, int cellWidth, int cellHeight, TextCellFactory tcf_)
      Description copied from interface: IPanelBuilder
      Builds a panel by the number of requested cells.
      Parameters:
      hCells - The number of horizontal cells of the panel to build.
      vCells - The number of vertical cells of the panel to build.
      cellWidth - The width of a cell (in pixels).
      cellHeight - The height of a cell (in pixels).
      tcf_ - The text cell factory to use, if any.
      Returns:
      A freshly built panel.

    • adjustCellSize

      public int adjustCellSize​(int sz)
      Parameters:
      sz -
      Returns:
      A valid cell size, as close as possible to sz.

      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • fontSizeForCellSize

      public int fontSizeForCellSize​(int cellSize)
      Returns:
      The font size to use for a square cell size of cellSize. Generally, it is cellSize; but it can be less in case glyphs are too large.

    • hasFontOfSize

      public boolean hasFontOfSize​(int sz)
      Returns:
      Whether a square font of size sz is available.

    • setDefaultForegroundColor

      public void setDefaultForegroundColor​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color c)
      Parameters:
      c - The default foreground color that freshly created panels will have. Can be null to use SquidPanel's default.
